name: Hidden Objects Winter Snow Christmas Holiday Time
name_original: Hidden Objects Winter Snow Christmas Holiday Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Winter Snow Holiday is a magnificently designed search and finder game with Winter Wonderland & Christmas themed levels.

Find festive Christmas and Winter themed objects like Santa Claus, Rudolph, Snowmen, Reindeer, Christmas Lights, Stockings, Holly, Wreaths, snow covered Christmas Trees, Elves, Candy, Gingerbread Cookies, Ornaments, Presents, frozen Icicles, Snow Globes and more!

Explore Winter Snow scenes by seeing Central Park (New York) covered in ice, Santa’s Sleigh, snow-covered Forests, Arctic Penguins, Christmas Tree farm and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure through Winter season is sure to get you in the festive X-mas spirit!

Hidden Objects – Winter Snow Holiday features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics reflecting Christmas and frozen Winter themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Drag Scene to Search


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
